Summary: Ufo "Imense" in size hovering and flying past apartment buildings
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There were no other sightings in La Porte on or around March 30th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend just called me a bit ago, reporting a sighting of a ufo as she was unloading her car this evening. She says a craft of immense size was hovering over her apartment buildings. This is the 2nd encounter with crafts in her area in 2 weeks! The first sightings weren't as close to her apartments, but they're getting close! She says the craft was about 2 trucks in width. It hovered then took off. The craft was triangle with lights just as she saw before.
